description: A person heavily bundled in a winter coat crouches low, extending a hand offering nuts to two squirrels. The squirrels stand upright on the bare ground, facing the person. The individual expresses an intense emotional reaction to the squirrels' posture, finding their upright stance overwhelmingly adorable. This scene captures the human tendency to anthropomorphize and find extreme cuteness in simple animal behaviors. The strong sentimentality towards the squirrels' natural position adds a layer of subtle absurdity to the interaction.
caption: “I can’t stand it. ... They’re so cute when they sit like that.”
